name: Falling Rocks
description:
Falling rocks is a simple 2D game made in Unity.

The main objective is to avoid rocks which are falling at your paddle and last as long as you can! There are surprise little power-ups as well! The game is very simple yet intuitive to play and will remind you of some of the older games you used to play!

Source code is available on GitHub!

Controls:-

or - Move the paddle left or right

Show/Hide timer

Mute/Unmute
